game.name: Worms Reloaded: Forts Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Worms™ Reloaded "Forts Pack" features 20 addictive and challenging single-player levels, based upon a variety of fort-based mission objectives. The "Forts Pack" also includes 10 brand new forts for multi-player battles, 3 new hats, 3 new speech banks, 3 new gravestones, a new "Fort" landscape th
